plays.text: Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Steve Sullivan

Penalty to Eric Daze 2 minutes for High Sticking Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Holding Steve Sullivan
Penalty to Steve Sullivan 2 minutes for Roughing Maxim Kuznetsov

Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Holding Tony Amonte
